Vutthāna Sutta：1．Vutthāna Sutta．Among those who practise meditation are those who are skilled in emerging from concentration．S．iii．265．

2．Vutthāna Sutta． Some that are skilled in emerging from concentration are not skilled in the object of concentration，the range，the resolve，in zeal，perseverance and profit．S．iii．273f．
